reviews.text: Well we had a fantastic week of skiing with Esprit Again.
reviews.title: Esprit Excellent As Always - The Hotel Mariandre is OK

reviews.text: We have been to thee Esprit hotels: Courchevel which we rate 9/10, then Belle Plagne which can only be 20/10 and the Mariandre around 7-8/10.
reviews.title: Hotel Mariandre Esprit team

reviews.text: So after staying at Belle Plagne over Christmas, we were probably expecting too much of Mariandre a couple of months later.
reviews.title: Hotel la mariande alpe dhuez

reviews.text: We were in room 204 which is tiny. At first I thought all the rooms were small but seems we picked a particularly small one. Serves us right for booking late i guess.
reviews.title: Great resort and skiing. Poor hotel.

reviews.text: The rooms are pretty basic, typical Alpine style, nothing like belle plagne at all!
reviews.title: Great holiday - would've been improved by better communication from management
